   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          destroy/1,
   36:          negative/1,
   37:          error_info/1,
   38:          end_of_list/1]).
   39: 
   40: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   41: 
   42: 
   43: -undef(line).
   44: -ifdef(debug).
   45: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   46: -else.
   47: -define(line,void).
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: -export([foo/0, exported/1]).
   51: 
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   55: 
   56: all() ->
   57:     [
   58:      basic,
   59:      call,
   60:      meta,
   61:      on_load,
   62:      trace_info_on_load,
   63:      procs,
   64:      test_set_on_spawn,
   65:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   66:      test_set_on_link,
   67:      test_set_on_first_link,
   68:      destroy,
   69:      negative,
   70:      error_info,
   71:      end_of_list].
   72: 
   73: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   74:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   75:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   76: 
   77: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   79:         false ->
   80:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   81:         true ->
   82:             ignore
   83:     end.
   84: 
   85: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   86:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   87: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   88:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   89: 
   90: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   91:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   92: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   93:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList).
   94: 
   95: 
   96: on_load(_Config) ->
   97:     Tester= self(),
   98:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
   99:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  100:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  101:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  102:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  103:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  104: 
  105:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  106:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  107:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  108: 
  109:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  110:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  111:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  112:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  113:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  114:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  115:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  116: 
  117:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  118:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  119:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  120:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  121: 
  122:     ok.
  123: 
  124: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  125:     Tester = self(),
  126:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  127:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  128:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  129:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  130:     {all,[{traced,global},
  131:       {match_spec,[]},
  132:       {meta,false},
  133:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  134:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  135:     ok.
  136: 
  137: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  138:     Tracee = self(),
  139:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  140:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  141:     dummy:module_info(),
  142:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  143:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  144:     ?line,
  145:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  146:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  147:     dummy:module_info(),
  148:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  149:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  150:     ?line,
  151:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  152:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  153:     ok.
  154: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  155:     Tracee = self(),
  156:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  157:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  158:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  159:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  160:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  161:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  162:     dummy:module_info(),
  163:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  164:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  165:     ?line,
  166:     receive_unsorted(
  167:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  168:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  169:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  170:     dummy:module_info(),
  171:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  172:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  173:     ?line,
  174:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  175:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  176:     dummy:module_info(),
  177:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  178:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  179:     ?line,
  180:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  181: 
  182:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  183:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  187:     Tester= self(),
  188:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  189:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  190:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  191:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  192:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  193:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  194: 
  195:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  196:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  197:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  198:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  199:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  200:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  201:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  202: 
  203:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  204:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  205:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  206:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  207: 
  208:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  209:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  210:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  211: 
  212:     unlink(Tracer0),
  213:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  214:     unlink(Tracer1),
  215:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  216:     unlink(Tracer2),
  217:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  218:     ok.
  219: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  220:     Tester= self(),
  221:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  222:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  223:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  224:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  225:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  226:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  227: 
  228:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  229:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  230:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  231:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  232:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  233:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  234:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  235: 
  236:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  237:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  238:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  239:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  240: 
  241:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  242:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  243:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  244: 
  245:     unlink(Tracer0),
  246:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  247:     unlink(Tracer1),
  248:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  249:     unlink(Tracer2),
  250:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  251:     ok.
  252: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  253:     Tester= self(),
  254:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  255:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  256:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  257:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  258:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  259:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  260: 
  261:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  262:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  263:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  264:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  265:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  266:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  267:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  268: 
  269:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  270:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  271:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  272:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  273:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  274:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  275:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  276: 
  277:     unlink(Tracer0),
  278:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  279:     unlink(Tracer1),
  280:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  281:     unlink(Tracer2),
  282:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  283:     ok.
  284: 
  285: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  286:     Tester= self(),
  287:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  288:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  289:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  290:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  291:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  292:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  293: 
  294:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  295:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  296:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  297:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  298:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  299:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  300:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  301: 
  302:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  303:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  304:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  305:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  306:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  307:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  308:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  309: 
  310:     unlink(Tracer0),
  311:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  312:     unlink(Tracer1),
  313:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  314:     unlink(Tracer2),
  315:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  316:     ok.
  317: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  318:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  319:     Tracee = self(),
  320:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  321:                           receive hej ->
  322:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  323:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  324:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  325:                                   F()
  326:                           end
  327:                   end),
  328:     Child ! hej,
  329:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  330:     exit(Child, die),
  331:     receive_parallel(
  332:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  333: 
  334:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  335:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  336:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  337: 
  338:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  339:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  340:       }),
  341:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  342:     ok.
  343: 
  344: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  345:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  346:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  347:     Tracee = self(),
  348:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  349:                           receive hej ->
  350:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  351:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  352:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  353:                                   F()
  354:                           end
  355:                   end),
  356:     Child ! hej,
  357:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  358:     exit(Child, die),
  359:     receive_parallel(
  360:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  361: 
  362:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  363: 
  364:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  365:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  366:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  367: 
  368:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  369:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  370:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  371: 
  372:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  373:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  374: 
  375:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  376:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  377:       }),
  378: 
  379:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  380: 
  381:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  382:                            receive hej ->
  383:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  384:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  385:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  386:                                    F()
  387:                            end
  388:                    end),
  389:     Child1 ! hej,
  390:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  391:     exit(Child1, die),
  392:     receive_parallel(
  393:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  394: 
  395:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  396:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  397:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  398: 
  399:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  400:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  401:       }),
  402: 
  403:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  404:     ok.
  405: 
  406: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  407:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  408:     Tracee = self(),
  409:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  410:                                 receive hej ->
  411:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  412:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  413:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  414:                                         F()
  415:                                 end
  416:                         end),
  417:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  418:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  419:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  420:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  421:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  422:     receive_parallel(
  423:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  424:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  425: 
  426:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  427:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  428:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  429: 
  430:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  431:     ok.
  432: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  433:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  434:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  435:     Tracee = self(),
  436:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  437:                                 receive hej ->
  438:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  439:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  440:                                         Tracee ! done,
  441:                                         F()
  442:                                 end
  443:                         end),
  444:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  445:     receive done -> ok end,
  446:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  447:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  448:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  449:     receive_parallel(
  450:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  451:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  452: 
  453:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  454:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  455: 
  456:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  457:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  458:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  459: 
  460:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  461:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  462:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  463:       }),
  464: 
  465:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  466:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  467:                                  receive hej ->
  468:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  469:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  470:                                          F()
  471:                                  end
  472:                          end),
  473:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  474:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  475:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  476:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  477: 
  478:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  479:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  480:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  481:     ok.
  482: 
  483: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  484:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  485:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  486:     Tracee = self(),
  487:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  488:     unlink(Child),
  489:     exit(Child, die),
  490:     receive_parallel(
  491:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  492:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  493:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  494: 
  495:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  496:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  497:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  498:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  499:       }),
  500: 
  501:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  502:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  503:     link(Child2),
  504:     unlink(Child2),
  505:     exit(Child2, die),
  506:     receive_parallel(
  507:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  508:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  509:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  510: 
  511:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  512:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  513:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  514:        }),
  515: 
  516:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  517:     %% from child process
  518:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  519:     link(Child3),
  520:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  521:     unlink(Child3),
  522:     exit(Child3, die),
  523:     receive_parallel(
  524:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  525:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  526: 
  527:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  528:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  529:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  530:       }),
  531: 
  532:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  533:     %% and get messages from the parent
  534:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  535:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  536:     link(Child4),
  537:     receive_parallel(
  538:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  539:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  540: 
  541:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  542:       }),
  543:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  544:     unlink(Child4),
  545:     exit(Child4, die),
  546:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  547: 
  548:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  549:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  550:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  551:     ok.
  552: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  553:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  554:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  555:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  556:     Tracee = self(),
  557:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  558:     unlink(Child),
  559:     exit(Child, die),
  560: 
  561:     receive_parallel(
  562:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  563:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  564:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  565: 
  566:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  567:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  568:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  569: 
  570:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  571:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  572:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  573:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  574: 
  575:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  576:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  577:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  578:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  579:       }),
  580: 
  581:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  582:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  583:     ?line,
  584:     link(Child1),
  585:     unlink(Child1),
  586:     exit(Child1, die),
  587: 
  588:     receive_parallel(
  589:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  590:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  591:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  592: 
  593:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  594:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  595:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  596: 
  597:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  598:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  599:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  600: 
  601:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  602:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  603:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  604:       }),
  605: 
  606:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  607:     %% via spawn_link/1
  608:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  609:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  610:     unlink(Child2),
  611:     exit(Child2, die),
  612:     receive_parallel(
  613:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  614:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  615:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  616: 
  617:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  618:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  619:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  620:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  621:       }),
  622:     %% Test with link/1
  623:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  624:     link(Child21),
  625:     unlink(Child21),
  626:     exit(Child21, die),
  627:     receive_parallel(
  628:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  629:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  630:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  631: 
  632:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  633:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  634:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  635:       }),
  636:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  637:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  638:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  639:     link(Child11),
  640:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  641:     receive_parallel(
  642:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  643:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  644: 
  645:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  646:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  647: 
  648:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  649: 
  650:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  651:       }),
  652:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  653:     unlink(Child11),
  654:     exit(Child11, die),
  655:     receive_parallel(
  656:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  657: 
  658:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  659: 
  660:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  661:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  662:       }),
  663: 
  664:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  665:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  666:     ok.
  667: 
  668: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  669:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  670:     Tracee = self(),
  671:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  672:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  673:     unlink(Child),
  674:     exit(Child, die),
  675:     unlink(Child1),
  676:     exit(Child1, die),
  677:     receive_parallel(
  678:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  679:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  680:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  681:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  682:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  683:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  684: 
  685:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  686:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  687:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  688:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  689:       }),
  690:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  691:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  692:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  693:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  694:     link(Child2),
  695:     link(Child21),
  696:     unlink(Child2),
  697:     unlink(Child21),
  698:     exit(Child2, die),
  699:     exit(Child21,die),
  700:     receive_parallel(
  701:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  702:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  703:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  704:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  705:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  706:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  707: 
  708:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  709:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  710:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  711:       }),
  712:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  713:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  714:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  715:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  716:                                       Tracee ! done,
  717:                                       F()
  718:                               end
  719:                    end),
  720:     link(Child3),
  721:     Child3 ! hej,
  722:     receive done -> ok end,
  723:     unlink(Child3),
  724:     exit(Child3, die),
  725:     receive_parallel(
  726:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  727:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  728:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  729: 
  730:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  731:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  732:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  733:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  734:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  735:       }),
  736:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  737:     ok.
  738: 
  739: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  740:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  741:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  742:     Tracee = self(),
  743:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  744:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  745:     receive_parallel(
  746:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  747:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  748:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  749:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  750: 
  751:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  752:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  753:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  754:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  755: 
  756:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  757:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  758: 
  759:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  760:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  761:        }),
  762: 
  763:     unlink(Child),
  764:     exit(Child, die),
  765:     unlink(Child1),
  766:     exit(Child1, die),
  767:     receive_parallel(
  768:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  769:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  770: 
  771:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  772:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  773: 
  774:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  775:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  776: 
  777:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  778:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  779:       }),
  780: 
  781:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  782:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  783:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  784:     unlink(Child2),
  785:     exit(Child2, die),
  786:     unlink(Child21),
  787:     exit(Child21, die),
  788:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  789:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  790:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  791:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  792:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  793:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  794:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  795:     ok.
  796: procs(_Config) ->
  797:     Tester= self(),
  798:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  799:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  800:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  801: 
  802:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  803: 
  804:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  805:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  806:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  807: 
  808:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  809:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  810:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  811:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  812:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  813:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  814: 
  815:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  816:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  817:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  818:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  819: 
  820:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  821:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  822:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  823: 
  824:     unlink(Tracer0),
  825:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  826:     unlink(Tracer1),
  827:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  828:     unlink(Tracer2),
  829:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  830:     ok.
  831: 
  832: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  833:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  834: 
  835:     Tracee = self(),
  836:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  837:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  838:     unregister(RegName),
  839:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  840:     link(Child),
  841:     unlink(Child),
  842:     exit(Child, die),
  843:     receive_parallel(
  844:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  845:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  846:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  847:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  848:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  849: 
  850:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  851:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  852:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  853:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  854:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  855: 
  856:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  857:     unregister(RegName),
  858:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  859:     link(Child1),
  860:     unlink(Child1),
  861:     exit(Child1, die),
  862: 
  863:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  864: 
  865:     ok.
  866: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  867:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  868:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  869: 
  870:     Tracee = self(),
  871:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  872:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  873:     unregister(RegName),
  874:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  875:     link(Child),
  876:     unlink(Child),
  877:     exit(Child, die),
  878:     receive_parallel(
  879:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  880:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  881:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  882:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  883:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  884: 
  885:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  886:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  887:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  888:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  889:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  890: 
  891:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  892:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  893:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  894:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  895: 
  896:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  897:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  898:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  899:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  900:       }),
  901: 
  902:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  903:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  904:     unregister(RegName),
  905:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  906:     link(Child1),
  907:     unlink(Child1),
  908:     exit(Child1, die),
  909:     receive_parallel(
  910:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  911:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  912:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  913:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  914:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  915: 
  916:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  917:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  918:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  919:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  920:       }),
  921: 
  922:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  923:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  924:     unregister(RegName),
  925:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  926:     link(Child2),
  927:     unlink(Child2),
  928:     exit(Child2, die),
  929:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  930:     ok.
  931: 
  932: basic(_Config) ->
  933:     Tester = self(),
  934:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  935:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  936:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  937: 
  938:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  939: 
  940:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  941:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  942:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  943: 
  944:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  945:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  946:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  947:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  948:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  949:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  950: 
  951:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  952:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  953:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  954:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  955: 
  956:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  957:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  958:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  959: 
  960:     unlink(Tracer0),
  961:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  962:     unlink(Tracer1),
  963:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  964:     unlink(Tracer2),
  965:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  966: 
  967:     ok.
  968: 
  969: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  970:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  971: 
  972:     Tracee = self(),
  973:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  974:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  975:     unregister(RegName),
  976: 
  977:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  978:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  979: 
  980:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  981: 
  982:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  983:     unregister(RegName),
  984: 
  985:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  986: 
  987:     ok.
  988: 
  989: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  990:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
  991:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
  992: 
  993:     Tracee = self(),
  994:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  995:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  996:     unregister(RegName),
  997: 
  998:     receive_unsorted(
  999:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1000:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}}]),
 1001:     receive_unsorted(
 1002:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
 1003:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]),
 1004: 
 1005:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1006: 
 1007:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1008:     unregister(RegName),
 1009: 
 1010:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1011:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1012: 
 1013:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1014: 
 1015:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1016:     unregister(RegName),
 1017: 
 1018:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1019: 
 1020:     ok.
 1021: 
 1022: 
 1023: call(_Config) ->
 1024:     Tester = self(),
 1025:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1026:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1027:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1028: 
 1029:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1030: 
 1031:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1032:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1033:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1034: 
 1035:     [begin
 1036:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1037:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1038:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1039:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1040:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1041:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1042:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1043: 
 1044:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1045:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1046:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1047:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1048:      end
 1049:      || CallType <- [
 1050:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1051:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1052:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1053:     ],
 1054: 
 1055:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1056:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1057:     ok = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1058: 
 1059:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1060:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1061:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1062:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1063:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1064:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1065: 
 1066:     ok.
 1067: 
 1068: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1069:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1070:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1071:     Tracee = self(),
 1072:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1073:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1074: 
 1075:     foo(),
 1076: 
 1077:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1078: 
 1079:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1080: 
 1081:     foo(),
 1082:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1083: 
 1084:     ok.
 1085: 
 1086: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1087:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1088:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1089:     Tracee = self(),
 1090:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1091:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1092: 
 1093:     ?line,
 1094:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1095:     Call(),
 1096:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1097:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1098: 
 1099:     ?line,
 1100:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1101:     Call(),
 1102:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1103:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1104:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1105: 
 1106:     ?line,
 1107:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1108:     Call(),
 1109:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1110:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1111: 
 1112:     ?line,
 1113:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1114:     Call(),
 1115:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1116:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1117:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1118: 
 1119:     ?line,
 1120:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1121:     Call(),
 1122:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1123:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1124: 
 1125:     ?line,
 1126:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1127:     Call(),
 1128:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1129:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1130:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?line,
 1133:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1134:     Call(),
 1135:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1136:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1137: 
 1138:     ?line,
 1139:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1140:     Call(),
 1141:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1142: 
 1143:     ?line,
 1144:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1145:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1146:     Call(),
 1147:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1148: 
 1149:     ok.
 1150: 
 1151: meta(_Config) ->
 1152:     Tester = self(),
 1153:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1154: 
 1155:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1156:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1157:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,true,[{meta,Tracer0}]),
 1158: 
 1159:     ?line,
 1160:     foo(),
 1161:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1162: 
 1163:     ?line,
 1164:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1165:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1166: 
 1167:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,false,[meta]),
 1168: 
 1169:     ?line,
 1170:     foo(),
 1171:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1172: 
 1173:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1174:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1175: 
 1176:     ok.
 1177: 
 1178: destroy(_Config) ->
 1179:     SName = ?MODULE,
 1180:     S1 = trace:session_create(SName, self(), []),
 1181: 
 1182:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1183:     destroy_do(SName, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1184: 
 1185:     S2 = trace:session_create(SName, self(), []),
 1186: 
 1187:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1188:     put(session, S2),
 1189:     destroy_do(SName, fun() -> erase(session),
 1190:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1191:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1192:                                ok
 1193:                       end),
 1194: 
 1195:     ok.
 1196: 
 1197: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1198:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1199:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1200:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1201:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1202:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1203:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1204: 
 1205:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1206:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1207:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1208:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1209:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1210:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1211:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1212:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1213:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1214: 
 1215:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1216:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1217:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1218:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1219:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1220:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1221:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1222:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1223:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1224:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1225:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1226: 
 1227:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1228:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1229:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1230:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1231:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1232:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1233:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1234:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1235:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1236: 
 1237:     Destroyer(),
 1238: 
 1239:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1240:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1241:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1242:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1243:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1244:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1245:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1246:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1247:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1248:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1249:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1250: 
 1251:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1252:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1253:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1254:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1255:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1256:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1257:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1258:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1259:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1260:     true.
 1261: 
 1262: negative(_Config) ->
 1263:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1264:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1265:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1266:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1267:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1268: 
 1269:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1270:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1271:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1272:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1273: 
 1274:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1275:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1276:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1277:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1278:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1279: 
 1280:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1281:     ok.
 1282: 
 1283: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1284: error_info(_Config) ->
 1285:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1286:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1287:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1288:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1289:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1290:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1291: 
 1292:     L = [
 1293:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1294:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1295:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1296:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1297:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1298:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1299: 
 1300:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1301:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1302:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1303:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1304:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1305:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1306: 
 1307: 
 1308:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1309:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1310:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1311:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1312:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1313:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1314: 
 1315:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1316:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1317:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1318: 
 1319:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1320:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1321:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1322: 
 1323:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1324:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1325:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1326:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1327:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1328: 
 1329:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1330:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1331:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1332:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1333: 
 1334:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1335:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1336:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1337: 
 1338:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]}
 1339:         ],
 1340: 
 1341:     try
 1342:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L)
 1343:     after
 1344:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1345:     end.
 1346: 
 1347: 
 1348: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1349:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1350: 
 1351: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1352: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1353:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1354:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1355: 
 1356: foo() ->
 1357:     ok.
 1358: 
 1359: exported(X) ->
 1360:     local(X).
 1361: 
 1362: local(_) ->
 1363:     ok.
 1364: 
 1365: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1366:     receive M ->
 1367:             io:format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1368:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1369:     end,
 1370:     tracer(Name, Tester).
 1371: 
 1372: 
 1373: receive_any() ->
 1374:     receive_any(1000).
 1375: 
 1376: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1377:     receive M -> M
 1378:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1379:     end.
 1380: 
 1381: receive_nothing() ->
 1382:     receive_any(10).
 1383: 
 1384: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1385: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1386: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1387: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1388: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1389:     ok;
 1390: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1391:     M = receive_any(),
 1392:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1393: 
 1394: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1395:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1396:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1397:         {true, []} ->
 1398:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1399:         {true, _} ->
 1400:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1401:         {false, _} ->
 1402:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1403:     end;
 1404: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1405:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1406:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1407:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1408:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1409: 
 1410: 
 1411: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1412:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1413: 
 1414: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1415:     M = receive_any(),
 1416:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1417:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1418: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1419:     ok.
 1420: 
 1421: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1422:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1423:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1424:         false ->
 1425:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1426:     end;
 1427: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1428:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1429:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1430:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1431: 
 1432: 
 1433: 
 1434: match(A, A) -> true;
 1435: match('_', _) -> true;
 1436: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1437:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1438: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1439:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1440: match(_A, _B) ->
 1441:     false.
 1442: 
 1443: 
 1444: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1445:     ok.
